tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    latitude NUMERIC,
    longitude NUMERIC,
    disposal_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(100),
  location GEOGRAPHY(POINT),
  disposal_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE strategic_decisions (
  decision_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  decision_description TEXT,
  decision_date TIMESTAMP,
  site_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES waste_disposal_sites(id)
)

CREATE TABLE WasteSites (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(100),
  location POINT,
  capacity DECIMAL,
  opening_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SiteMaintenance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT REFERENCES WasteSites(id),
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  next_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE SiteReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT REFERENCES WasteSites(id),
  report_date DATE,
  issues_found TEXT,
  action_taken TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(50),
  location POINT,
  capacity INT,
  last_pickup_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_trucks (
  truck_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  truck_name VARCHAR(50),
  current_location POINT,
  capacity INT,
  last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_site_assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  truck_id INT,
  assignment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE site_statistics (
  site_id INT,
  total_waste_collected INT,
  capacity_utilization FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (site_id)
)

CREATE TABLE truck_statistics (
  truck_id INT,
  total_distance_traveled FLOAT,
  average_speed FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (truck_id)
)
